<xf:macro name="thread_promote" arg-thread="!" arg-rowType="">
<xf:checkboxrow hideempty="true" rowtype="{$rowType}" label="{{ phrase('BCxencat_articles') }}">
<xf:if is="{{ $xf.visitor.hasPermission('BCxencat', 'submitArticles') }}"> <xf:option name="article-promote" value="1" selected="{{ in_array($thread.node_id, $xf.options.BCxencat_article_forums) }}" label="{{ phrase('BCxencat_promote_to_article') }}" hint="{{ phrase('BCxencat_promote_to_article_hint') }}"> </xf:option> </xf:if> </xf:checkboxrow> </xf:macro>

<xf:numberboxrow name="options[limit]" value="{$options.limit}" min="1" label="{{ phrase('maximum_entries') }}" />
<xf:selectrow name="options[category]" value="{$options.category}" label="{{ phrase('category') }}"> <xf:option value="">( {{ phrase('unspecified') }} )</xf:option> <xf:foreach loop="$categories" value="$category"> <xf:option value="{$category.category_id}">{$category.category_name}</xf:option> </xf:foreach> </xf:selectrow> <xf:radiorow name="options[layout]" value="{$options.layout}" label="{{ phrase('BCxencat_articles_layout') }}"> <xf:option value="list">{{ phrase('BCxencat_list_layout') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="standard">{{ phrase('BCxencat_standard_layout') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="grid">{{ phrase('BCxencat_grid_layout') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="grid-col2">{{ phrase('BCxencat_grid_col2_layout') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="masonry">{{ phrase('BCxencat_masonry_layout') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="masonry-col2">{{ phrase('BCxencat_masonry_col2_layout') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="boxed">{{ phrase('BCxencat_boxed_layout') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="overlay">{{ phrase('BCxencat_overlay_layout') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="mixed">{{ phrase('BCxencat_mixed_layout') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="mixed-2">{{ phrase('BCxencat_mixed2_layout') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="photography">{{ phrase('BCxencat_photography_layout') }}</xf:option> </xf:radiorow>

<xf:checkboxrow> <xf:option name="options[controls]" selected="$options.controls"> {{ phrase('BCxencat_features_show_prev_next_controls') }} </xf:option> <xf:option name="options[autoControls]" selected="$options.autoControls"> {{ phrase('BCxencat_features_enable_auto_play_slider') }} </xf:option> </xf:checkboxrow>
